title: Eon 2.9 – Simple and elegant time tracking
content: Eon helps you easily track time on your Mac. Eon allows you to easily post time to several services to make invoicing as painless as possible.   Version 2.9: Fixed: Issues with Zoho Invoice and Zoho Books authentication.   Intel, 64-bit processor macOS 10.12 or later

title: Mic Drop 1.4.2 – Mute your mic with a hotkey
